org.dlw.ai.blackboard.knowledge
Interface KnowledgeSources

All Known Implementing Classes:
KnowledgeSourcesImpl
public interface KnowledgeSources

The KnowledgeSources interface represents some form of collections object that is used to hold individual or unique KnowledgeSource objects. A reset and load method signature are provided so that the developer can choose a collection type based on her requirements and handle these operations through implementation.

Version:
1.0.0-RC
Author:
David L. Whitehurst

Method Summary
 void init()
          Load and initialize knowledge sources
 void initializeKnowledgeSources()
          This method is called by init() and reset() to load knowledge sources with attribute data
 void loadKnowledgeSources()
          This method is called by init() and reset() to load unique knowledge sources
 void reset()
          Clear, reset, load and initialize the knowledge sources collection
